SET(DKK_EXTERNAL_LIST	xtc_lib
)

FOREACH(EXTERNAL ${DKK_EXTERNAL_LIST})
	ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${EXTERNAL})
	SET(DKK_EXTERNAL_INC_DIR "${DKK_EXTERNAL_INC_DIR} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${EXTERNAL}/include")
ENDFOREACH(EXTERNAL ${DKK_EXTERNAL_LIST})

#export variables to parent scope
SET(DKK_EXTERNAL_LIST ${DKK_EXTERNAL_LIST} PARENT_SCOPE)
SET(DKK_EXTERNAL_INC_DIR ${DKK_EXTERNAL_INC_DIR} PARENT_SCOPE)
